item.title: Lex- Fuchsia (Breakbeat)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I like it - I think switching up the bass melody would be helpful in breaking the repetition. I like the arp at 1:30 reminds me of a sid station lol (EDIT: This isnâ€™t a slight the Sid Station was effin awesome!)

The guitar sounding synth at ~2:02 is nice. Great end to the track too haha

item.title: Lex- Fuchsia (Breakbeat)

item.description:
Thanks! I agree lol, I tried my best to make it as non-irritating as possible :<

I can probably tweak it a bit when the full album is released onto my SC. (I donâ€™t make my music for profit, just for fun, so it wonâ€™t be on iTunes or anything.)
